com.netflix.genie.server.util

Class StringUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.netflix.genie.server.util.StringUtil

  • public final class StringUtil
extends java.lang.Object
    Utility class to parse string (for command-line arguments, versions, etc).

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static java.lang.String ARG_DELIMITER
      The argument delimiter, which is set to white space.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static java.lang.String[] splitCmdLine(java.lang.String input)
      Mimics bash command-line parsing as close as possible.
      Caveat - only supports double quotes, not single quotes.
      static java.lang.String trimVersion(java.lang.String fullVersion)
      Returns a canonical version number with at most 3 digits of the form X.Y.Z.
      0.8.1.4 -> 0.8.1, 0.8.2 -> 0.8.2, 0.8 -> 0.8.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

        public static final java.lang.String ARG_DELIMITER
        The argument delimiter, which is set to white space.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

    • Method Detail

      • splitCmdLine

        public static java.lang.String[] splitCmdLine(java.lang.String input)
                                       throws CloudServiceException
        Mimics bash command-line parsing as close as possible.
        Caveat - only supports double quotes, not single quotes.
        Parameters:
        input - command-line arguments as a string
        Returns:
        argument array that is split using (as to close to) bash rules as possible
        Throws:
        CloudServiceException

      • trimVersion

        public static java.lang.String trimVersion(java.lang.String fullVersion)
        Returns a canonical version number with at most 3 digits of the form X.Y.Z.
        0.8.1.4 -> 0.8.1, 0.8.2 -> 0.8.2, 0.8 -> 0.8.
        Parameters:
        fullVersion - input version number
        Returns:
        trimmed version number as documented
